blocks.content: Value of the interval function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm ixxval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wceq(co(c0, c2, c1), crab(s0, cxr, wa(wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c1)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpo(s1, s2, cxr, cxr, crab(s0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wceq(co(c0, c2, c1), crab(s0, cxr, wa(wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c1))))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wceq(co(c0, c2, c1), crab(s0, cxr, wa(wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c1))))), diffsc(s0, c4))
  ovmpt2(s1, s2, c0, cxr, c1, cxr, c2, crab(s0, cxr, wa(wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c1))), crab(s0, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)))), crab(s0, cxr, wa(wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)))))
  rabbidv(s0, cxr, wceq(cv(s1), c0), wa(wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2))), wa(wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2))))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)), wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)))
  breq1(cv(s1), c0, c3, cv(s0))
  rabbidv(s0, cxr, wceq(cv(s2), c1), wa(wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2))), wa(wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c1)))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s2), c1), wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c1))
  breq2(cv(s2), c1, cv(s0), c4)
  rabex(s0, cxr, wa(wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c1)))
  xrex()
  diff.crab.s(s1, s0, cxr, wa(wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c1)))
  diff.cxr.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c1))
  diff.wbr.s(s1, c0, c3, cv(s0))
  diff.wbr.s(s1, cv(s0), c4, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.crab.s(s2, s0, cxr, wa(wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c1)))
  diff.cxr.s(s2)
  diff.wa.s(s2, wbr(c0, c3, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c1))
  diff.wbr.s(s2, c0, c3, cv(s0))
  diff.wbr.s(s2, cv(s0), c4, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s2), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cxr.s(s0)
}

thm ixxval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*)‚Üí(c0[c2]c1)= { s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* |(c0[c3]s0 ‚àß s0[c4]c1)})
  ‚ä£ c2 =(s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, s2 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚Ü¶ { s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* |(s1[c3]s0 ‚àß s0[c4]s2)})
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*)‚Üí(c0[c2]c1)= { s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* |(c0[c3]s0 ‚àß s0[c4]c1)}), d(s0, c3))
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*)‚Üí(c0[c2]c1)= { s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* |(c0[c3]s0 ‚àß s0[c4]c1)}), d(s0, c4))
  ovmpt2(s1, s2, c0, cxr, c1, cxr, c2, { s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* |(c0[c3]s0 ‚àß s0[c4]c1)}, { s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* |(s1[c3]s0 ‚àß s0[c4]s2)}, { s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* |(c0[c3]s0 ‚àß s0[c4]s2)})
  rabbidv(s0, cxr, s1 = c0, (s1[c3]s0 ‚àß s0[c4]s2), (c0[c3]s0 ‚àß s0[c4]s2))
  anbi1d(s1 = c0, s1[c3]s0, s0[c4]s2, c0[c3]s0)
  breq1(s1, c0, c3, s0)
  rabbidv(s0, cxr, s2 = c1, (c0[c3]s0 ‚àß s0[c4]s2), (c0[c3]s0 ‚àß s0[c4]c1))
  anbi2d(s2 = c1, c0[c3]s0, s0[c4]s2, s0[c4]c1)
  breq2(s2, c1, s0, c4)
  rabex(s0, cxr, (c0[c3]s0 ‚àß s0[c4]c1))
  xrex()
  diff.crab.s(s1, s0, cxr, (c0[c3]s0 ‚àß s0[c4]c1))
  diff.cxr.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, c0[c3]s0, s0[c4]c1)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, c0, c3, s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, s0, c4, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.crab.s(s2, s0, cxr, (c0[c3]s0 ‚àß s0[c4]c1))
  diff.cxr.s(s2)
  diff.wa.s(s2, c0[c3]s0, s0[c4]c1)
  diff.wbr.s(s2, c0, c3, s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s2, s0, c4, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, s1, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, s2, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cxr.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: elixx1
blocks.content: Membership in an interval of extended reals. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm elixx1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wb(wcel(c2, co(c0, c3, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, c4, c2), wbr(c2, c5, c1))))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpo(s0, s1, cxr, cxr, crab(s2, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c5, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wb(wcel(c2, co(c0, c3, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, c4, c2), wbr(c2, c5, c1)))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wb(wcel(c2, co(c0, c3, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, c4, c2), wbr(c2, c5, c1)))), diffsc(s1, c2))
  syl6bb(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(c2, co(c0, c3, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, c4, c2), wbr(c2, c5, c1)), wcel(c2, crab(s2, cxr, wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c5, c1)))))
  eleq2d(c2, co(c0, c3, c1), crab(s2, cxr, wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c5, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)))
  ixxval(s2, s0, s1, c0, c1, c3, c4, c5)
  bitr4i(wcel(c2, crab(s2, cxr, wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c5, c1)))), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, c4, c2), wbr(c2, c5, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cxr), wa(wbr(c0, c4, c2), wbr(c2, c5, c1))))
  elrab(s2, c2, cxr, wa(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c5, c1)), wa(wbr(c0, c4, c2), wbr(c2, c5, c1)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s2), c2), wbr(c0, c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c5, c1), wbr(c0, c4, c2), wbr(c2, c5, c1))
  breq2(cv(s2), c2, c0, c4)
  breq1(cv(s2), c2, c5, c1)
  3anass(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, c4, c2), wbr(c2, c5, c1))
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cxr.s(s2)
  diff.wa.s(s2, wbr(c0, c4, c2), wbr(c2, c5, c1))
  diff.wbr.s(s2, c0, c4, c2)
  diff.wbr.s(s2, c2, c5, c1)
}

thm elixx1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*)‚Üí(c2 ‚àà(c0[c3]c1)‚Üî(c2 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c0[c4]c2 ‚àß c2[c5]c1)))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚Ü¶ { s2 ‚àà ‚Ñù* |(s0[c4]s2 ‚àß s2[c5]s1)})
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)

  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c2)

  ‚ä£ d(s2, c5)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*)‚Üí(c2 ‚àà(c0[c3]c1)‚Üî(c2 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c0[c4]c2 ‚àß c2[c5]c1))), d(s0, c2))
  a1ii(((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*)‚Üí(c2 ‚àà(c0[c3]c1)‚Üî(c2 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c0[c4]c2 ‚àß c2[c5]c1))), d(s1, c2))
  syl6bb((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*), c2 ‚àà(c0[c3]c1), (c2 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c0[c4]c2 ‚àß c2[c5]c1), c2 ‚àà { s2 ‚àà ‚Ñù* |(c0[c4]s2 ‚àß s2[c5]c1)})
  eleq2d(c2, (c0[c3]c1), { s2 ‚àà ‚Ñù* |(c0[c4]s2 ‚àß s2[c5]c1)}, (c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*))
  ixxval(s2, s0, s1, c0, c1, c3, c4, c5)
  bitr4i(c2 ‚àà { s2 ‚àà ‚Ñù* |(c0[c4]s2 ‚àß s2[c5]c1)}, (c2 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c0[c4]c2 ‚àß c2[c5]c1), (c2 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß(c0[c4]c2 ‚àß c2[c5]c1)))
  elrab(s2, c2, cxr, (c0[c4]s2 ‚àß s2[c5]c1), (c0[c4]c2 ‚àß c2[c5]c1))
  anbi12d(s2 = c2, c0[c4]s2, s2[c5]c1, c0[c4]c2, c2[c5]c1)
  breq2(s2, c2, c0, c4)
  breq1(s2, c2, c5, c1)
  3anass(c2 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, c0[c4]c2, c2[c5]c1)

  diffss.ex(s2, s1)

}

blocks.name: ixxf
blocks.content: The set of intervals of extended reals maps to subsets of extended reals. (Contributed by FL, 14-Jun-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 16-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm ixxf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wf(c0, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, cxr, cxr, crab(s2, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wf(c0, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr)), diffss(s0, s2))
  a1ii(wf(c0, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr)), diffss(s1, s2))
  a1ii(wf(c0, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr)), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wf(c0, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr)), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wf(c0, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr)), diffsc(s1, c1))
  a1ii(wf(c0, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr)), diffsc(s1, c2))
  a1ii(wf(c0, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr)), diffsc(s2, c1))
  a1ii(wf(c0, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr)), diffsc(s2, c2))
  mpbi(wf(c0, cxp(cxr, cxr), cpw(cxr)), wral(s0, cxr, wral(s1, cxr, wcel(crab(s2, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)))), cpw(cxr)))))
  rgen2w(s0, s1, cxr, cxr, wcel(crab(s2, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)))), cpw(cxr)))
  elpwi2(crab(s2, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)))), cxr, universe)
  xrex()
  ssrab2(s2, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1))))
  fmpt2(s0, s1, cxr, cxr, crab(s2, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c1, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s1)))), cpw(cxr), c0)
  diff.cxr.s(s2)
  diff.cpw.s(s0, cxr)
  diff.cxr.s(s0)
  diff.cpw.s(s1, cxr)
  diff.cxr.s(s1)
}

thm ixxf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 :(‚Ñù* √ó ‚Ñù*)‚Üí P(‚Ñù*))
  ‚ä£ c0 =(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚Ü¶ { s2 ‚àà ‚Ñù* |(s0[c1]s2 ‚àß s2[c2]s1)})

  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)

  a1ii((c0 :(‚Ñù* √ó ‚Ñù*)‚Üí P(‚Ñù*)), d(s0, s2))

  mpbi((c0 :(‚Ñù* √ó ‚Ñù*)‚Üí P(‚Ñù*)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, { s2 ‚àà ‚Ñù* |(s0[c1]s2 ‚àß s2[c2]s1)} ‚àà P(‚Ñù*))))
  rgen2w(s0, s1, cxr, cxr, { s2 ‚àà ‚Ñù* |(s0[c1]s2 ‚àß s2[c2]s1)} ‚àà P(‚Ñù*))

thm ixxex(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  -| diffsc(s2, c1)

  bitrd(wn(wa(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c3, cxr))), wcel(c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), wa(wa(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c3, cxr)), wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wa(wbr(c1, c4, c0), wbr(c0, c5, c3)))), wcel(c0, emptycls))

blocks.name: ixxssixx
blocks.content: An interval is a subset of its closure. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 18-Oct-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Nov-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm ixxssixx(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wss(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c0, c3, c2))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpo(s0, s1, cxr, cxr, crab(s2, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c5, cv(s1))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpo(s0, s1, cxr, cxr, crab(s2, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c6, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c7, cv(s1))))))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(cv(s3), cxr)), wi(wbr(c0, c4, cv(s3)), wbr(c0, c6, cv(s3))))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s3), cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wi(wbr(cv(s3), c5, c2), wbr(cv(s3), c7, c2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c7)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c6)
  -| diffsc(s2, c7)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c3)
} = {
  ssriv(s3, co(c0, c1, c2), co(c0, c3, c2))
  mpcom(wcel(cv(s3), co(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s3), co(c0, c3, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)))

thm ixxss1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wss(co(c2, c3, c4), co(c0, c5, c4)))
  -| wceq(c5, cmpo(s0, s1, cxr, cxr, crab(s2, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c6, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c7, cv(s1))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cmpo(s0, s1, cxr, cxr, crab(s2, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c8, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c7, cv(s1))))))
  -| wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(cv(s3), cxr)), wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c8, cv(s3))), wbr(c0, c6, cv(s3))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s0, c8)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c7)
  -| diffsc(s1, c8)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c6)
  -| diffsc(s2, c7)
  -| diffsc(s2, c8)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c3)
  -| diffsc(s3, c4)
  -| diffsc(s3, c5)
} = {
  ssrdv(s3, co(c2, c3, c4), co(c0, c5, c4), wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c0, c1, c2)))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s3), co(c2, c3, c4)), wcel(cv(s3), co(c0, c5, c4)))
  mpbir3and(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s3), co(c2, c3, c4))), wcel(cv(s3), co(c0, c5, c4)), wcel(cv(s3), cxr), wbr(c0, c6, cv(s3)), wbr(cv(s3), c7, c4))
  mp2and(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s3), co(c2, c3, c4))), wbr(c0, c6, cv(s3)), wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c8, cv(s3)))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(s3), co(c2, c3, c4)))
  simpld(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s3), co(c2, c3, c4))), wbr(c2, c8, cv(s3)), wbr(cv(s3), c7, c4))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s3), co(c2, c3, c4))), wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c8, cv(s3))), wbr(c0, c6, cv(s3))), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(cv(s3), cxr))
  simp1d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s3), co(c2, c3, c4))), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c4, cxr), wcel(cv(s3), cxr))
  simp3d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s3), co(c2, c3, c4))), wcel(cv(s3), cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c4, cxr))
  simprd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s3), co(c2, c3, c4))), wbr(cv(s3), c7, c4), wbr(c2, c8, cv(s3)))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s3), co(c2, c3, c4)), wa(wbr(c2, c8, cv(s3)), wbr(cv(s3), c7, c4)))
  simprbi(wcel(cv(s3), co(c2, c3, c4)), wa(wbr(c2, c8, cv(s3)), wbr(cv(s3), c7, c4)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c4, cxr), wcel(cv(s3), cxr)))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s3), co(c2, c3, c4))), wb(wcel(cv(s3), co(c0, c5, c4)), w3a(wcel(cv(s3), cxr), wbr(c0, c6, cv(s3)), wbr(cv(s3), c7, c4))), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c4, cxr))
  simpll(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c0, c1, c2), wcel(cv(s3), co(c2, c3, c4)))
  simp2d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s3), co(c2, c3, c4))), wcel(c4, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(cv(s3), cxr))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s3), co(c2, c3, c4)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c4, cxr), wcel(cv(s3), cxr)))
  simplbi(wcel(cv(s3), co(c2, c3, c4)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c4, cxr), wcel(cv(s3), cxr)), wa(wbr(c2, c8, cv(s3)), wbr(cv(s3), c7, c4)))
  elixx3g(s0, s1, s2, cv(s3), c2, c3, c4, c8, c7)
  elixx1(s0, s1, s2, c0, c4, cv(s3), c5, c6, c7)
  diff.co.s(s3, c2, c3, c4)
  diff.co.s(s3, c0, c5, c4)
  diff.wa.s(s3, wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c0, c1, c2))
  diff.wcel.s(s3, c0, cxr)
  diff.cxr.s(s3)
  diff.wbr.s(s3, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s3)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s3)
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c0[c1]c2)‚Üí(c2[c3]c4)‚äÜ(c0[c5]c4))

} = {

blocks.content: Subset relationship for intervals of extended reals. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Nov-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 28-Apr-2015.)

thm ixxss2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c1, c2, c0)), wss(co(c3, c4, c1), co(c3, c5, c0)))
  -| wceq(c5, cmpo(s0, s1, cxr, cxr, crab(s2, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c6, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c7, cv(s1))))))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpo(s0, s1, cxr, cxr, crab(s2, cxr, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c6, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s2), c8, cv(s1))))))
  -| wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s3), cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c0, cxr)), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s3), c8, c1), wbr(c1, c2, c0)), wbr(cv(s3), c7, c0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s0, c8)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c7)
  -| diffsc(s1, c8)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c6)
  -| diffsc(s2, c7)
  -| diffsc(s2, c8)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c3)
  -| diffsc(s3, c4)
  -| diffsc(s3, c5)
} = {
  ssrdv(s3, co(c3, c4, c1), co(c3, c5, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c1, c2, c0)))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c1, c2, c0)), wcel(cv(s3), co(c3, c4, c1)), wcel(cv(s3), co(c3, c5, c0)))
  mpbir3and(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c1, c2, c0)), wcel(cv(s3), co(c3, c4, c1))), wcel(cv(s3), co(c3, c5, c0)), wcel(cv(s3), cxr), wbr(c3, c6, cv(s3)), wbr(cv(s3), c7, c0))
  simpld(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c1, c2, c0)), wcel(cv(s3), co(c3, c4, c1))), wbr(c3, c6, cv(s3)), wbr(cv(s3), c8, c1))
  mp2and(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c1, c2, c0)), wcel(cv(s3), co(c3, c4, c1))), wbr(cv(s3), c7, c0), wbr(cv(s3), c8, c1), wbr(c1, c2, c0))
  simprd(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c1, c2, c0)), wcel(cv(s3), co(c3, c4, c1))), wbr(cv(s3), c8, c1), wbr(c3, c6, cv(s3)))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c1, c2, c0)), wcel(cv(s3), co(c3, c4, c1)), wa(wbr(c3, c6, cv(s3)), wbr(cv(s3), c8, c1)))
  simprbi(wcel(cv(s3), co(c3, c4, c1)), wa(wbr(c3, c6, cv(s3)), wbr(cv(s3), c8, c1)), w3a(wcel(c3, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(cv(s3), cxr)))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c1, c2, c0), wcel(cv(s3), co(c3, c4, c1)))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c1, c2, c0)), wcel(cv(s3), co(c3, c4, c1))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s3), c8, c1), wbr(c1, c2, c0)), wbr(cv(s3), c7, c0)), wcel(cv(s3), cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c0, cxr))
  simp3d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c1, c2, c0)), wcel(cv(s3), co(c3, c4, c1))), wcel(cv(s3), cxr), wcel(c3, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr))
  simp2d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c1, c2, c0)), wcel(cv(s3), co(c3, c4, c1))), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c3, cxr), wcel(cv(s3), cxr))

blocks.name: ixxub
blocks.content: Extract the upper bound of an interval. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: iooex
blocks.content: The set of open intervals of extended reals exists. (Contributed by NM, 6-Feb-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Nov-2013.)

blocks.name: iooval

thm iooval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wceq(co(c0, cioo, c1), crab(s0, cxr, wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), clt, c1)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  ixxval(s0, hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cioo, clt, clt)
  df-ioo(hs0, hs1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.clt.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

  diff.hs0.c(clt)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(clt)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: ioon0

  eleq2d(c2, co(c0, cioo, c1), crab(hs0, cr, wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c1))), wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)))
  iooval2(hs0, c0, c1)

  elrab(hs0, c2, cr, wa(wbr(c0, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, c1)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, clt, c1)))

  breq2(cv(hs0), c2, c0, clt)
  breq1(cv(hs0), c2, clt, c1)
  3anass(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, clt, c1))

thm iccid(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cxr), wceq(co(c0, cicc, c0), csn(c0)))
} = {

thm ioc0(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*)‚Üí((c0[(,]]c1)= ‚àÖ ‚Üî c1[‚â§]c0))
} = {
  bitrd((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*), (c0[(,]]c1)= ‚àÖ, c1[‚â§]c0, { hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* |(c0[<]hs0 ‚àß hs0[‚â§]c1)} = ‚àÖ)
  eqeq1d((c0[(,]]c1), emptycls, { hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* |(c0[<]hs0 ‚àß hs0[‚â§]c1)}, (c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*))
  iocval(hs0, c0, c1)
  con4bid((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*), { hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* |(c0[<]hs0 ‚àß hs0[‚â§]c1)} = ‚àÖ, c1[‚â§]c0)
  bitrd((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*), ¬¨ { hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* |(c0[<]hs0 ‚àß hs0[‚â§]c1)} = ‚àÖ, ¬¨ c1[‚â§]c0, c0[<]c1)
  syl5bb((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*), ¬¨ { hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* |(c0[<]hs0 ‚àß hs0[‚â§]c1)} = ‚àÖ, c0[<]c1, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù*,(c0[<]hs0 ‚àß hs0[‚â§]c1)))
  bitr3i(¬¨ { hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* |(c0[<]hs0 ‚àß hs0[‚â§]c1)} = ‚àÖ, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù*,(c0[<]hs0 ‚àß hs0[‚â§]c1)), { hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* |(c0[<]hs0 ‚àß hs0[‚â§]c1)} ‚â† ‚àÖ)
  df-ne({ hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* |(c0[<]hs0 ‚àß hs0[‚â§]c1)}, emptycls)
  rabn0(hs0, cxr, (c0[<]hs0 ‚àß hs0[‚â§]c1))
  impbid((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*), ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù*,(c0[<]hs0 ‚àß hs0[‚â§]c1)), c0[<]c1)
  rexlimdva(hs0, cxr, (c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*), (c0[<]hs0 ‚àß hs0[‚â§]c1), c0[<]c1)
  3expa(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, ((c0[<]hs0 ‚àß hs0[‚â§]c1)‚Üí c0[<]c1))
  3com23(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, ((c0[<]hs0 ‚àß hs0[‚â§]c1)‚Üí c0[<]c1))
  xrltletr(c0, hs0, c1)
  3expia(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, c0[<]c1, ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù*,(c0[<]hs0 ‚àß hs0[‚â§]c1)))
  mpd((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c0[<]c1), ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù*,(c0[<]hs0 ‚àß hs0[‚â§]c1)), ‚àÉ(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñö,(c0[<]hs0 ‚àß hs0[<]c1)))
  qbtwnxr(hs0, c0, c1)
  reximdv2(hs0, cq, cxr, (c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c0[<]c1), (c0[<]hs0 ‚àß hs0[<]c1), (c0[<]hs0 ‚àß hs0[‚â§]c1))
  pm2.43b((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c0[<]c1), (hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñö ‚àß(c0[<]hs0 ‚àß hs0[<]c1)), (hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß(c0[<]hs0 ‚àß hs0[‚â§]c1)))
  adantr(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñö, (c0[<]hs0 ‚àß hs0[<]c1), ((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c0[<]c1)‚Üí((hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñö ‚àß(c0[<]hs0 ‚àß hs0[<]c1))‚Üí(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß(c0[<]hs0 ‚àß hs0[‚â§]c1)))))
  syl(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñö, ((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c0[<]c1)‚Üí((hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñö ‚àß(c0[<]hs0 ‚àß hs0[<]c1))‚Üí(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß(c0[<]hs0 ‚àß hs0[‚â§]c1)))), hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù*)
  ex(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, (c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c0[<]c1), ((hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñö ‚àß(c0[<]hs0 ‚àß hs0[<]c1))‚Üí(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß(c0[<]hs0 ‚àß hs0[‚â§]c1))))

  a1i((hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c0[<]c1)), (hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñö ‚Üí hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù*))
  rexrd(hs0, hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñö)
  qre(hs0)
  anim2d((hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c0[<]c1)), c0[<]hs0, hs0[<]c1, hs0[‚â§]c1)
  3ad2antr2(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, c0[<]c1, (hs0[<]c1 ‚Üí hs0[‚â§]c1))
  xrltle(hs0, c1)
  xrltnle(c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*))
  diff.hs0.w(c0[<]c1)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c0[<]c1))
}

  pnfxr()
  adantl(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, co(c0, cico, c2)), wbr(c1, clt, c2))
  simprd(wcel(c1, co(c0, cico, c2)), wbr(c1, clt, c2), wbr(c0, cle, c1))

  adantl(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, co(c0, cico, c2)), wbr(c2, cle, cpnf))

  elixx3g(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, c0, cico, c2, cle, clt)
  df-ico(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  pnfge(c2)
  xrre3(c1, c0)

blocks.name: ubioc1

blocks.name: lbico1
blocks.content: The lower bound belongs to a closed-below, open-above interval. See ~ lbicc2 . (Contributed by FL, 29-May-2014.)

blocks.name: iccleub
blocks.content: An element of a closed interval is less than or equal to its upper bound. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 14-Jul-2009.)

blocks.name: iccgelb
blocks.content: An element of a closed interval is more than or equal to its lower bound. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Dec-2016.)

blocks.name: elioo5

blocks.name: eliooxr

blocks.name: eliooord
blocks.content: Ordering implied by a member of an open interval of reals. (Contributed by NM, 17-Aug-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-May-2014.)

  |- wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)), wa(w3a(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c0, cr)), wa(wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c2))))
} = {

  jca(wcel(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)), w3a(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c0, cr)), wa(wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c2)))

  jca(wcel(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)), wa(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wcel(c0, cr))
  eliooxr(c0, c1, c2)

  df-3an(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c0, cr))
  eliooord(c0, c1, c2)
  sylibr(wa(w3a(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c0, cr)), wa(wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c2))), wcel(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)), wa(w3a(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c0, cxr)), wa(wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c2))))
  anim1i(w3a(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c0, cr)), wa(wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c2)), w3a(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c0, cxr)))

thm elioc2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wb(wcel(c2, co(c0, cioc, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1))))
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(c2, co(c0, cioc, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1)))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), wb(wcel(c2, co(c0, cioc, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1))), wcel(c1, cxr))
  elioc1(c0, c1, c2)

  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1)))
  3jca(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1))), wcel(c2, cr), wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1))
  mpbir2and(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1))), wcel(c2, cr), wbr(cmnf, clt, c2), wbr(c2, clt, cpnf))
  xrlelttrd(cmnf, c2, c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1))))
  a1i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1))), wcel(cmnf, cxr))
  mnfxr()
  simpll(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1)))
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1)), wbr(cmnf, cle, c0))
  mnfle(c0)
  xrlelttrd(c2, cpnf, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1))))
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1)), wcel(c1, cxr))
  rexr(c1)

  pnfxr()
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1)), wbr(c1, clt, cpnf))
  ltpnf(c1)
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1))), wb(wcel(c2, cr), wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, c2), wbr(c2, clt, cpnf))), wcel(c2, cxr))
  simpr1(wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1))
  xrrebnd(c2)

  3anim1i(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1), wcel(c2, cxr))

blocks.content: Membership in a closed-below, open-above real interval. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 21-Jan-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2014.)

thm elico2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wb(wcel(c2, co(c0, cico, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, clt, c1))))

  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(c2, co(c0, cico, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, clt, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, clt, c1)))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cxr), wb(wcel(c2, co(c0, cico, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, clt, c1))), wcel(c0, cxr))
  elico1(c0, c1, c2)
  impbid1(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cxr)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, clt, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, clt, c1)))
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cxr)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, clt, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, clt, c1)))
  3jca(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cxr)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, clt, c1))), wcel(c2, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, clt, c1))
  mpbir2and(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cxr)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, clt, c1))), wcel(c2, cr), wbr(cmnf, clt, c2), wbr(c2, clt, cpnf))
  xrltletrd(cmnf, c2, c0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cxr)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, clt, c1))))
  a1i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cxr)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, clt, c1))), wcel(cmnf, cxr))
  mnfxr()
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cxr), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, clt, c1)), wcel(c0, cxr))
  rexr(c0)
  ad2antrr(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cxr), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, clt, c1)), wbr(cmnf, clt, c0))
  mnflt(c0)
  xrltletrd(c2, cpnf, c1, wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cxr)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, clt, c1))))
  simplr(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cxr), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, clt, c1)))
  a1i(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cxr)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, clt, c1))), wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  pnfxr()
  ad2antlr(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cxr), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, clt, c1)), wbr(c1, cle, cpnf))
  pnfge(c1)
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cxr)), w3a(wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, clt, c1))), wb(wcel(c2, cr), wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, c2), wbr(c2, clt, cpnf))), wcel(c2, cxr))
  simpr1(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, clt, c1))
  xrrebnd(c2)
  simpr2(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, clt, c1))
  simpr3(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, clt, c1))
  3anim1i(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, clt, c1), wcel(c2, cxr))
  rexr(c2)

blocks.name: iccssioo2
blocks.content: Condition for a closed interval to be a subset of an open interval. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm iccssioo2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cioo, c2))), wss(co(c0, cicc, c3), co(c1, cioo, c2)))
} = {
  syl12anc(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cioo, c2))), wss(co(c0, cicc, c3), co(c1, cioo, c2)), wa(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(c3, clt, c2))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cioo, c2))), wa(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wne(co(c1, cioo, c2), emptycls))
  adantr(wcel(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cioo, c2)), wne(co(c1, cioo, c2), emptycls))
  ne0i(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2))
  necon1ai(co(c1, cioo, c2), emptycls, wa(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)))
  ndmioo(c1, c2)
  simpld(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cioo, c2))), wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cioo, c2)), wa(wbr(c1, clt, c0), wbr(c0, clt, c2)))
  eliooord(c0, c1, c2)
  simprd(wa(wcel(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cioo, c2))), wbr(c3, clt, c2), wbr(c1, clt, c3))
  adantl(wcel(c0, co(c1, cioo, c2)), wcel(c3, co(c1, cioo, c2)), wa(wbr(c1, clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, c2)))
  eliooord(c3, c1, c2)
  iccssioo(c1, c2, c0, c3)
}

  adantr(c0 ‚àà(c1[(,)]c2), c3 ‚àà(c1[(,)]c2), (c1[(,)]c2)‚â† ‚àÖ)

thm ioomax() {
  |- wceq(co(cmnf, cioo, cpnf), cr)
} = {
  eqtr4i(co(cmnf, cioo, cpnf), cr, crab(hs0, cr, wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cpnf))))
  mp2an(wceq(co(cmnf, cioo, cpnf), crab(hs0, cr, wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cpnf)))), wcel(cmnf, cxr), wcel(cpnf, cxr))
  mnfxr()
  pnfxr()
  iooval2(hs0, cmnf, cpnf)
  mprgbir(hs0, cr, wceq(cr, crab(hs0, cr, wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cpnf)))), wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cpnf)))
  rabid2(hs0, cr, wa(wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cpnf)))
  jca(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wbr(cmnf, clt, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), clt, cpnf))
  mnflt(cv(hs0))
  ltpnf(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(cmnf)
  diff.hs0.c(cpnf)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
}

thm iooshf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr))), wb(wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cioo, c3)), wcel(c0, co(co(c2, caddc, c1), cioo, co(c3, caddc, c1)))))

  3jca(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wss(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(c3, c2)), wss(c2, cr), wne(c2, emptycls), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c2, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))))
  3adant3(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wss(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(c3, c2), wss(c2, cr))
  sylan(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wss(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1)), wss(c2, cr), wss(co(c0, cicc, c1), cr))

  ne0i(c3, c2)
  3adant3(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wss(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(c3, c2), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c2, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wss(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1))), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c2, wbr(cv(s1), cle, cv(s0)))), wcel(c1, cr), wral(s1, c2, wbr(cv(s1), cle, c1)))

  imp(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wss(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1))), wcel(cv(s1), c2), w3a(wcel(cv(s1), cr), wbr(c0, cle, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), cle, c1)))

blocks.content: The nonnegative reals are closed under multiplication. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)

blocks.name: ge0xaddcl
blocks.content: The nonnegative reals are closed under addition. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: ge0xmulcl
blocks.content: The nonnegative extended reals are closed under multiplication. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)

blocks.name: lbicc2
blocks.content: The lower bound of a closed interval is a member of it. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 26-Nov-2007.) (Revised by FL, 29-May-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2015.)

blocks.name: ubicc2
blocks.content: The upper bound of a closed interval is a member of it. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 26-Nov-2007.) (Revised by FL, 29-May-2014.)

blocks.name: elicc01
blocks.content: Membership in the closed real interval between 0 and 1, also called the closed unit interval. (Contributed by AV, 20-Aug-2022.)

blocks.name: 0elunit
blocks.content: Zero is an element of the closed unit interval. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Jun-2013.)

blocks.name: 1elunit
blocks.content: One is an element of the closed unit interval. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 11-Jun-2013.)

blocks.name: iooneg

blocks.origin:

  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wb(wcel(c2, co(c0, cioo, c1)), wcel(cneg(c2), co(cneg(c1), cioo, cneg(c0)))))
} = {

  biancomd(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, clt, c1)), wbr(cneg(c1), clt, cneg(c2)), wbr(cneg(c2), clt, cneg(c0)))

  3adant2(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wb(wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(cneg(c2), clt, cneg(c0))))
  ltneg(c0, c2)
  3adant1(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wb(wbr(c2, clt, c1), wbr(cneg(c1), clt, cneg(c2))))
  ancoms(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wb(wbr(c2, clt, c1), wbr(cneg(c1), clt, cneg(c2))))
  ltneg(c2, c1)
  syl3an(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wb(wcel(c2, co(c0, cioo, c1)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, clt, c1))), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr))

  rexr(c2)

  3com12(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wb(wcel(cneg(c2), co(cneg(c1), cioo, cneg(c0))), wa(wbr(cneg(c1), clt, cneg(c2)), wbr(cneg(c2), clt, cneg(c0)))))
  syl3an(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wb(wcel(cneg(c2), co(cneg(c1), cioo, cneg(c0))), wa(wbr(cneg(c1), clt, cneg(c2)), wbr(cneg(c2), clt, cneg(c0)))), wcel(cneg(c1), cr), wcel(cneg(c0), cr), wcel(cneg(c2), cr))
  renegcl(c1)
  renegcl(c0)
  renegcl(c2)
  syl3an(wcel(cneg(c1), cr), wcel(cneg(c0), cr), wcel(cneg(c2), cr), wb(wcel(cneg(c2), co(cneg(c1), cioo, cneg(c0))), wa(wbr(cneg(c1), clt, cneg(c2)), wbr(cneg(c2), clt, cneg(c0)))), wcel(cneg(c1), cxr), wcel(cneg(c0), cxr), wcel(cneg(c2), cxr))
  rexr(cneg(c1))
  rexr(cneg(c0))
  rexr(cneg(c2))

  3adant2(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, c2 ‚àà ‚Ñù, (c0[<]c2 ‚Üî -u(c2)[<]-u(c0)))
  ltneg(c0, c2)
  3adant1(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, c2 ‚àà ‚Ñù, (c2[<]c1 ‚Üî -u(c1)[<]-u(c2)))

  renegcl(c1)
  renegcl(c0)
  renegcl(c2)
  syl3an(-u(c1)‚àà ‚Ñù, -u(c0)‚àà ‚Ñù, -u(c2)‚àà ‚Ñù, (-u(c2)‚àà(-u(c1)[(,)]-u(c0))‚Üî(-u(c1)[<]-u(c2)‚àß -u(c2)[<]-u(c0))), -u(c1)‚àà ‚Ñù*, -u(c0)‚àà ‚Ñù*, -u(c2)‚àà ‚Ñù*)
  rexr(-u(c1))

blocks.name: iccneg
blocks.content: Membership in a negated closed real interval. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 26-Nov-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm iccneg(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wb(wcel(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(cneg(c2), co(cneg(c1), cicc, cneg(c0)))))
} = {
  3bitr4d(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wcel(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(cneg(c2), co(cneg(c1), cicc, cneg(c0))), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1))), wa(wcel(cneg(c2), cr), wa(wbr(cneg(c1), cle, cneg(c2)), wbr(cneg(c2), cle, cneg(c0)))))

  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wb(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(cneg(c2), cr)))
  impbid2(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(cneg(c2), cr))
  renegcl(c2)
  ax-1(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(cneg(c2), cr))
  syl5bbr(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1)), wa(wbr(cneg(c1), cle, cneg(c2)), wbr(cneg(c2), cle, cneg(c0))), wa(wbr(c2, cle, c1), wbr(c0, cle, c2)))
  ancom(wbr(c2, cle, c1), wbr(c0, cle, c2))

  3adant1(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wb(wbr(c2, cle, c1), wbr(cneg(c1), cle, cneg(c2))))
  ancoms(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wb(wbr(c2, cle, c1), wbr(cneg(c1), cle, cneg(c2))))
  leneg(c2, c1)
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wb(wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(cneg(c2), cle, cneg(c0))))
  leneg(c0, c2)
  syl6bb(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wcel(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1))), w3a(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wb(wcel(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1))))
  elicc2(c0, c1, c2)
  3anass(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1))
  syl6bb(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wcel(cneg(c2), co(cneg(c1), cicc, cneg(c0))), wa(wcel(cneg(c2), cr), wa(wbr(cneg(c1), cle, cneg(c2)), wbr(cneg(c2), cle, cneg(c0)))), w3a(wcel(cneg(c2), cr), wbr(cneg(c1), cle, cneg(c2)), wbr(cneg(c2), cle, cneg(c0))))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wb(wcel(cneg(c2), co(cneg(c1), cicc, cneg(c0))), w3a(wcel(cneg(c2), cr), wbr(cneg(c1), cle, cneg(c2)), wbr(cneg(c2), cle, cneg(c0)))))
  syl2anr(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wb(wcel(cneg(c2), co(cneg(c1), cicc, cneg(c0))), w3a(wcel(cneg(c2), cr), wbr(cneg(c1), cle, cneg(c2)), wbr(cneg(c2), cle, cneg(c0)))), wcel(cneg(c1), cr), wcel(cneg(c0), cr))
  renegcl(c1)
  renegcl(c0)
  elicc2(cneg(c1), cneg(c0), cneg(c2))
  3anass(wcel(cneg(c2), cr), wbr(cneg(c1), cle, cneg(c2)), wbr(cneg(c2), cle, cneg(c0)))

  3adant1(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, c2 ‚àà ‚Ñù, (c2[‚â§]c1 ‚Üî -u(c1)[‚â§]-u(c2)))

blocks.name: icoshft
blocks.content: A shifted real is a member of a shifted, closed-below, open-above real interval. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 25-Mar-2008.)
blocks.origin:
thm icoshft(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wi(wcel(c3, co(c0, cico, c1)), wcel(co(c3, caddc, c2), co(co(c0, caddc, c2), cico, co(c1, caddc, c2)))))
} = {
  syld(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wcel(c3, co(c0, cico, c1)), wcel(co(c3, caddc, c2), co(co(c0, caddc, c2), cico, co(c1, caddc, c2))), wa(wcel(c3, cr), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c3), wbr(c3, clt, c1))))
  syl6ib(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wcel(c3, co(c0, cico, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, cr), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c3), wbr(c3, clt, c1))), w3a(wcel(c3, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c3), wbr(c3, clt, c1)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wi(wcel(c3, co(c0, cico, c1)), w3a(wcel(c3, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c3), wbr(c3, clt, c1))))
  biimpd(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(c3, co(c0, cico, c1)), w3a(wcel(c3, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c3), wbr(c3, clt, c1)))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wb(wcel(c3, co(c0, cico, c1)), w3a(wcel(c3, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c3), wbr(c3, clt, c1))), wcel(c1, cxr))
  rexr(c1)
  elico2(c0, c1, c3)
  3anass(wcel(c3, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c3), wbr(c3, clt, c1))
  sylbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wa(wcel(c3, cr), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c3), wbr(c3, clt, c1))), wcel(co(c3, caddc, c2), co(co(c0, caddc, c2), cico, co(c1, caddc, c2))), wa(wcel(c3, cr), wa(wbr(co(c0, caddc, c2), cle, co(c3, caddc, c2)), wbr(co(c3, caddc, c2), clt, co(c1, caddc, c2)))))
  pm5.32da(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wcel(c3, cr), wa(wbr(c0, cle, c3), wbr(c3, clt, c1)), wa(wbr(co(c0, caddc, c2), cle, co(c3, caddc, c2)), wbr(co(c3, caddc, c2), clt, co(c1, caddc, c2))))
  anbi12d(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wcel(c3, cr)), wbr(c0, cle, c3), wbr(c3, clt, c1), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c2), cle, co(c3, caddc, c2)), wbr(co(c3, caddc, c2), clt, co(c1, caddc, c2)))
  imp(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr)), wcel(c3, cr), wb(wbr(c0, cle, c3), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c2), cle, co(c3, caddc, c2))))

blocks.name: icoun
blocks.content: The union of two adjacent left-closed right-open real intervals is a left-closed right-open real interval. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 15-Mar-2008.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 16-Jun-2014.)

} = {
  ixxun(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, c0, c1, c2, cle, cle, cico, cico, cico, cle, clt, cle, clt)

  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)

blocks.name: ioounsn
blocks.content: The union of an open interval with its upper endpoint is a left-open right-closed interval. (Contributed by Jon Pennant, 8-Jun-2019.)

thm ioounsn(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wceq(cun(co(c0, cioo, c1), csn(c1)), co(c0, cioc, c1)))

  iccid(c1)

blocks.name: snunioo

thm snunioo(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wceq(cun(csn(c0), co(c0, cioo, c1)), co(c0, cico, c1)))

  simp2(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, clt, c1))

blocks.name: ioodisj
blocks.content: If the upper bound of one open interval is less than or equal to the lower bound of the other, the intervals are disjoint. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 13-Jul-2009.)

blocks.name: ioojoin
blocks.content: Join two open intervals to create a third. (Contributed by NM, 11-Aug-2008.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 16-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ioojoin(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2))), wceq(cun(cun(co(c0, cioo, c1), csn(c1)), co(c1, cioo, c2)), co(c0, cioo, c2)))
} = {
  syl5eq(cun(cun(co(c0, cioo, c1), csn(c1)), co(c1, cioo, c2)), co(c0, cioo, c2), cun(co(c0, cioo, c1), cun(csn(c1), co(c1, cioo, c2))), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2))))

  eqtrd(cun(co(c0, cioo, c1), cun(csn(c1), co(c1, cioo, c2))), co(c0, cioo, c2), cun(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c1, cico, c2)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(c0, clt, c1), wbr(c1, clt, c2))))

  3adantl1(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c1, clt, c2), wceq(cun(csn(c1), co(c1, cioo, c2)), co(c1, cico, c2)))

  snunioo(c1, c2)
  ixxun(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, c0, c1, c2, clt, clt, cioo, cico, cioo, clt, clt, cle, clt)

thm difreicc(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wceq(cdif(cr, co(c0, cicc, c1)), cun(co(cmnf, cioo, c0), co(c1, cioo, cpnf))))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, cdif(cr, co(c0, cicc, c1)), cun(co(cmnf, cioo, c0), co(c1, cioo, cpnf)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  syl5bb(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cr, co(c0, cicc, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(co(cmnf, cioo, c0), co(c1, cioo, cpnf))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1)))))
  eldif(cv(hs0), cr, co(c0, cicc, c1))

blocks.name: iccsplit
blocks.content: Split a closed interval into the union of two closed intervals. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)
blocks.origin:
thm iccsplit(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1))), wceq(co(c0, cicc, c1), cun(co(c0, cicc, c2), co(c2, cicc, c1))))

  eqrdv(hs0, co(c0, cicc, c1), cun(co(c0, cicc, c2), co(c2, cicc, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1))))

  3bitr4d(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c1)), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cicc, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cicc, c1))), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)), wo(w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c2)), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wbr(c2, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))))
  impbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1))), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1)), wo(w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wbr(c0, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c2)), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wbr(c2, cle, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c1))))

thm iccshftr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr))), wb(wcel(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(co(c2, caddc, c3), co(c4, cicc, c5))))
  -| wceq(co(c0, caddc, c3), c4)
  -| wceq(co(c1, caddc, c3), c5)
} = {
  3bitr4d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr))), wcel(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(co(c2, caddc, c3), co(c4, cicc, c5)), w3a(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1)), w3a(wcel(co(c2, caddc, c3), cr), wbr(c4, cle, co(c2, caddc, c3)), wbr(co(c2, caddc, c3), cle, c5)))
  3anbi123d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr))), wcel(c2, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1), wcel(co(c2, caddc, c3), cr), wbr(c4, cle, co(c2, caddc, c3)), wbr(co(c2, caddc, c3), cle, c5))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr)), wb(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(co(c2, caddc, c3), cr)))
  2thd(wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr)), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(co(c2, caddc, c3), cr))
  simpl(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr))
  readdcl(c2, c3)
  syl6bb(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr))), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c4, cle, co(c2, caddc, c3)), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c3), cle, co(c2, caddc, c3)))
  adantlr(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr)), wb(wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c3), cle, co(c2, caddc, c3))))
  3expb(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr), wb(wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(co(c0, caddc, c3), cle, co(c2, caddc, c3))))
  leadd1(c0, c2, c3)
  breq1i(co(c0, caddc, c3), cle, co(c2, caddc, c3), c4)
  syl6bb(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr))), wbr(c2, cle, c1), wbr(co(c2, caddc, c3), cle, c5), wbr(co(c2, caddc, c3), cle, co(c1, caddc, c3)))
  adantll(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr)), wb(wbr(c2, cle, c1), wbr(co(c2, caddc, c3), cle, co(c1, caddc, c3))))
  an12s(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr), wb(wbr(c2, cle, c1), wbr(co(c2, caddc, c3), cle, co(c1, caddc, c3))))
  3expb(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c3, cr), wb(wbr(c2, cle, c1), wbr(co(c2, caddc, c3), cle, co(c1, caddc, c3))))
  leadd1(c2, c1, c3)
  breq2i(co(c2, caddc, c3), cle, co(c1, caddc, c3), c5)
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr)), wb(wcel(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1))))
  elicc2(c0, c1, c2)
  adantrl(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr), wb(wcel(co(c2, caddc, c3), co(c4, cicc, c5)), w3a(wcel(co(c2, caddc, c3), cr), wbr(c4, cle, co(c2, caddc, c3)), wbr(co(c2, caddc, c3), cle, c5))))
  anandirs(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c3, cr), wb(wcel(co(c2, caddc, c3), co(c4, cicc, c5)), w3a(wcel(co(c2, caddc, c3), cr), wbr(c4, cle, co(c2, caddc, c3)), wbr(co(c2, caddc, c3), cle, c5))))
  syl2an(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c3, cr)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c3, cr)), wb(wcel(co(c2, caddc, c3), co(c4, cicc, c5)), w3a(wcel(co(c2, caddc, c3), cr), wbr(c4, cle, co(c2, caddc, c3)), wbr(co(c2, caddc, c3), cle, c5))), wcel(c4, cr), wcel(c5, cr))

  readdcl(c0, c3)
  syl5eqelr(c5, cr, co(c1, caddc, c3), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c3, cr)))
  readdcl(c1, c3)
  elicc2(c4, c5, co(c2, caddc, c3))
}

  adantr((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù), (c2 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c3 ‚àà ‚Ñù), (c2 ‚àà(c0[[,]]c1)‚Üî(c2 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c0[‚â§]c2 ‚àß c2[‚â§]c1)))
  elicc2(c0, c1, c2)
  adantrl((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù), c2 ‚àà ‚Ñù, c3 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ((c2[+]c3)‚àà(c4[[,]]c5)‚Üî((c2[+]c3)‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c4[‚â§](c2[+]c3)‚àß(c2[+]c3)[‚â§]c5)))
  anandirs(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, c3 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ((c2[+]c3)‚àà(c4[[,]]c5)‚Üî((c2[+]c3)‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c4[‚â§](c2[+]c3)‚àß(c2[+]c3)[‚â§]c5)))
  syl2an((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c3 ‚àà ‚Ñù), (c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c3 ‚àà ‚Ñù), ((c2[+]c3)‚àà(c4[[,]]c5)‚Üî((c2[+]c3)‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c4[‚â§](c2[+]c3)‚àß(c2[+]c3)[‚â§]c5)), c4 ‚àà ‚Ñù, c5 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  syl5eqelr(c4, cr, (c0[+]c3), (c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c3 ‚àà ‚Ñù))
  readdcl(c0, c3)
  syl5eqelr(c5, cr, (c1[+]c3), (c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c3 ‚àà ‚Ñù))
  readdcl(c1, c3)

}

thm iccshftl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {

  adantll(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr)), wb(wbr(c2, cle, c1), wbr(co(c2, cmin, c3), cle, co(c1, cmin, c3))))
  an12s(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr), wb(wbr(c2, cle, c1), wbr(co(c2, cmin, c3), cle, co(c1, cmin, c3))))

  elicc2(c0, c1, c2)
  adantrl(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, cr), wb(wcel(co(c2, cmin, c3), co(c4, cicc, c5)), w3a(wcel(co(c2, cmin, c3), cr), wbr(c4, cle, co(c2, cmin, c3)), wbr(co(c2, cmin, c3), cle, c5))))

  syl2an(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c3, cr)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c3, cr)), wb(wcel(co(c2, cmin, c3), co(c4, cicc, c5)), w3a(wcel(co(c2, cmin, c3), cr), wbr(c4, cle, co(c2, cmin, c3)), wbr(co(c2, cmin, c3), cle, c5))), wcel(c4, cr), wcel(c5, cr))

  resubcl(c0, c3)
  syl5eqelr(c5, cr, co(c1, cmin, c3), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c3, cr)))

thm iccdil(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {

} = {
  3bitr4d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, crp))), wcel(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(co(c2, cmul, c3), co(c4, cicc, c5)), w3a(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1)), w3a(wcel(co(c2, cmul, c3), cr), wbr(c4, cle, co(c2, cmul, c3)), wbr(co(c2, cmul, c3), cle, c5)))

  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, crp)), wb(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(co(c2, cmul, c3), cr)))
  2thd(wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, crp)), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(co(c2, cmul, c3), cr))

  ‚ä¢ (((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù)‚àß(c2 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c3 ‚àà ‚Ñù+))‚Üí(c2 ‚àà(c0[[,]]c1)‚Üî(c2[√ó]c3)‚àà(c4[[,]]c5)))

blocks.name: iccdili
blocks.content: Membership in a dilated interval. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)
blocks.origin:
thm iccdili(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c3), co(c4, cicc, c5)))
  -| wcel(c1, cr)
  -| wcel(c2, cr)
  -| wcel(c3, crp)
  -| wceq(co(c1, cmul, c3), c4)
  -| wceq(co(c2, cmul, c3), c5)
} = {
  mpcom(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c3), co(c4, cicc, c5)), wcel(c0, cr))
  sseli(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2), cr)
  mp2an(wss(co(c1, cicc, c2), cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr))
  iccssre(c1, c2)
  biimpd(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c3), co(c4, cicc, c5)))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, cr), wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c3), co(c4, cicc, c5))), wcel(c3, crp))
  mpanl12(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c3, crp)), wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c3), co(c4, cicc, c5))), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr))
  iccdil(c1, c2, c0, c3, c4, c5)
}

  mpanl12((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c3 ‚àà ‚Ñù+), (c0 ‚àà(c1[[,]]c2)‚Üî(c0[√ó]c3)‚àà(c4[[,]]c5)), c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, c2 ‚àà ‚Ñù)

thm icccntr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, crp))), wb(wcel(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(co(c2, cdiv, c3), co(c4, cicc, c5))))
  -| wceq(co(c0, cdiv, c3), c4)
  -| wceq(co(c1, cdiv, c3), c5)
} = {
  3bitr4d(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, crp))), wcel(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(co(c2, cdiv, c3), co(c4, cicc, c5)), w3a(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1)), w3a(wcel(co(c2, cdiv, c3), cr), wbr(c4, cle, co(c2, cdiv, c3)), wbr(co(c2, cdiv, c3), cle, c5)))

  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, crp)), wb(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(co(c2, cdiv, c3), cr)))
  2thd(wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, crp)), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(co(c2, cdiv, c3), cr))
  simpl(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, crp))
  rerpdivcl(c2, c3)
  syl6bb(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, crp))), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c4, cle, co(c2, cdiv, c3)), wbr(co(c0, cdiv, c3), cle, co(c2, cdiv, c3)))
  adantlr(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, crp)), wb(wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(co(c0, cdiv, c3), cle, co(c2, cdiv, c3))))
  3expb(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, crp), wb(wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(co(c0, cdiv, c3), cle, co(c2, cdiv, c3))))
  syl3an3b(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, crp), wb(wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(co(c0, cdiv, c3), cle, co(c2, cdiv, c3))), wa(wcel(c3, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c3)))
  lediv1(c0, c2, c3)
  breq1i(co(c0, cdiv, c3), cle, co(c2, cdiv, c3), c4)
  syl6bb(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, crp))), wbr(c2, cle, c1), wbr(co(c2, cdiv, c3), cle, c5), wbr(co(c2, cdiv, c3), cle, co(c1, cdiv, c3)))
  adantll(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, crp)), wb(wbr(c2, cle, c1), wbr(co(c2, cdiv, c3), cle, co(c1, cdiv, c3))))
  an12s(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, crp), wb(wbr(c2, cle, c1), wbr(co(c2, cdiv, c3), cle, co(c1, cdiv, c3))))
  3expb(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c3, crp), wb(wbr(c2, cle, c1), wbr(co(c2, cdiv, c3), cle, co(c1, cdiv, c3))))
  syl3an3b(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c3, crp), wb(wbr(c2, cle, c1), wbr(co(c2, cdiv, c3), cle, co(c1, cdiv, c3))), wa(wcel(c3, cr), wbr(nat0, clt, c3)))
  elrp(c3)
  lediv1(c2, c1, c3)
  breq2i(co(c2, cdiv, c3), cle, co(c1, cdiv, c3), c5)
  adantr(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, crp)), wb(wcel(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1)), w3a(wcel(c2, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c2), wbr(c2, cle, c1))))
  elicc2(c0, c1, c2)
  adantrl(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(c2, cr), wcel(c3, crp), wb(wcel(co(c2, cdiv, c3), co(c4, cicc, c5)), w3a(wcel(co(c2, cdiv, c3), cr), wbr(c4, cle, co(c2, cdiv, c3)), wbr(co(c2, cdiv, c3), cle, c5))))
  anandirs(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c3, crp), wb(wcel(co(c2, cdiv, c3), co(c4, cicc, c5)), w3a(wcel(co(c2, cdiv, c3), cr), wbr(c4, cle, co(c2, cdiv, c3)), wbr(co(c2, cdiv, c3), cle, c5))))
  syl2an(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c3, crp)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c3, crp)), wb(wcel(co(c2, cdiv, c3), co(c4, cicc, c5)), w3a(wcel(co(c2, cdiv, c3), cr), wbr(c4, cle, co(c2, cdiv, c3)), wbr(co(c2, cdiv, c3), cle, c5))), wcel(c4, cr), wcel(c5, cr))

  rerpdivcl(c1, c3)
  elicc2(c4, c5, co(c2, cdiv, c3))

thm icccntr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ (((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù)‚àß(c2 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c3 ‚àà ‚Ñù+))‚Üí(c2 ‚àà(c0[[,]]c1)‚Üî(c2[√∑]c3)‚àà(c4[[,]]c5)))
  ‚ä£ (c0[√∑]c3)= c4

blocks.name: icccntri
blocks.content: Membership in a contracted interval. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)
blocks.origin:
thm icccntri(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c3), co(c4, cicc, c5)))
  -| wcel(c1, cr)
  -| wcel(c2, cr)
  -| wcel(c3, crp)
  -| wceq(co(c1, cdiv, c3), c4)
  -| wceq(co(c2, cdiv, c3), c5)
} = {
  mpcom(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c3), co(c4, cicc, c5)), wcel(c0, cr))
  sseli(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2), cr)
  mp2an(wss(co(c1, cicc, c2), cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr))
  iccssre(c1, c2)
  biimpd(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c3), co(c4, cicc, c5)))
  mpan2(wcel(c0, cr), wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c3), co(c4, cicc, c5))), wcel(c3, crp))
  mpanl12(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c3, crp)), wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(co(c0, cdiv, c3), co(c4, cicc, c5))), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c2, cr))
  icccntr(c1, c2, c0, c3, c4, c5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm icccntri(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà(c1[[,]]c2)‚Üí(c0[√∑]c3)‚àà(c4[[,]]c5))
  ‚ä£ c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù
  ‚ä£ c2 ‚àà ‚Ñù

  ‚ä£ (c2[√∑]c3)= c5
} = {

  mpan2(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, (c0 ‚àà(c1[[,]]c2)‚Üî(c0[√∑]c3)‚àà(c4[[,]]c5)), c3 ‚àà ‚Ñù+)
  mpanl12((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c3 ‚àà ‚Ñù+), (c0 ‚àà(c1[[,]]c2)‚Üî(c0[√∑]c3)‚àà(c4[[,]]c5)), c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, c2 ‚àà ‚Ñù)

blocks.name: iccf1o
blocks.content: Describe a bijection from ` [ 0 , 1 ] ` to an arbitrary nontrivial closed interval ` [ A , B ] ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2015.)

blocks.content: The sum of an integer and a real number between 0 and 1 is less than or equal to a second integer iff the sum is less than the second integer. (Contributed by AV, 1-Jul-2021.)

  simplbiim(wcel(c2, co(nat0, cioo, nat1)), wbr(nat0, clt, c2), w3a(wcel(nat0, cxr), wcel(nat1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(nat0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, clt, nat1)))
  simpl(wbr(nat0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, clt, nat1))
  addlelt(c0, c1, c2)

  ltadd2dd(c0, c2, nat1, w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cioo, nat1))))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cioo, nat1)), wcel(c2, cr))
  1red(w3a(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, co(nat0, cioo, nat1))))

  simplbiim(wcel(c2, co(nat0, cioo, nat1)), wbr(c2, clt, nat1), w3a(wcel(nat0, cxr), wcel(nat1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr)), wa(wbr(nat0, clt, c2), wbr(c2, clt, nat1)))
